hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.description: I am a web developer specializing in modern frontend technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Iâ€™m a passionate developer with experience in building responsive web applications using modern technologies. I enjoy creating clean, user-friendly interfaces and solving challenging problems.

projects.title: Mybk Technology
projects.description: Mybk Technology is a platform that combines education and entertainment, allowing users to look up university entrance scores, stay updated with educational and entertainment news, and participate in online quizzes. The website supports both Vietnamese and English to cater to a wider audience.

projects.title: HCMUT Messenger
projects.description: HCMUT Messenger is an online messaging platform that allows users to send text messages and images quickly, securely, and conveniently. The website features a simple interface, real-time messaging, and strong privacy protection.

projects.title: Roced
projects.description: Roced is a modern e-commerce platform that allows users to easily browse, shop, and review their favorite products. The website provides a seamless shopping experience with advanced product filtering, a flexible cart system, a wishlist feature and easy follow your order.

projects.title: 3D house
projects.description: 3D House is a platform that provides modern 3D house designs, helping users find the perfect design for their needs. The website offers high-quality 3D models, detailed drawings, and guides to support home construction and renovation projects.
